issue.title: Option "send notification email to user" when request is sent does not work
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Two problems :

- for each user (in backend), there is a tab with option "request option". If set to no, the user should not receive email notification when he send a request.
The option (notificationrequesttreatment) is well saved in database... but not used ! 



**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
